data.text: Thank Yahweh, because he does good things for us;
Thank God, the one who is greater than all other gods;
Thank the Lord who is greater than all other lords/rulers;
He is the only one who performs great miracles;
He is the one who by being very wise created the heavens;
He is the one who caused the ground to rise up above the deep waters;
He is the one who created great lights in the sky;
He created the sun to shine in the daytime;
He created the moon and stars to shine during the nighttime;
He is the one who killed the firstborn males in Egypt;
He led the Israeli people out of Egypt;
With his ◄strong hand/great power► he led them out;
He is the one who caused the Red Sea to divide;
He enabled the Israeli people to walk through it on dry land;
But he caused the king of Egypt and his army to drown in it;
He is the one who led his people safely through the desert;
He killed powerful kings;
He killed kings who were famous;
He killed Sihon, the king of the Amor people-group;
He killed Og, the king of Bashan region;
He gave their lands to us, his people;
He gave those lands to us people of Israel, who serve him;
He is the one who did not forget about us when we were defeated by our enemies;
He rescued us from our enemies;
He is the one who gives food to all living creatures;
So thank God, who lives in heaven, for all those things,
